author: diguida
body:
This PR adds the possibility to configure Frontier connection in order to request the server sends digital signatures on every response. This is done by setting a `string` data member in `ConnectionPool` or the corresponding parameter in a `ParameterSet`. An unit test has been added. The default is `""`, so the current behaviour is kept.
In `Configuration/StandardSequences/python/FrontierConditions_GlobalTag_cfi.py` I cleaned up the old `ParameterSet` pointing to the CondDBv1 implementation, and replaced it with the CondDBv2 values.
No regression expected.
title: Add frontier security option, and cleanup Standard Sequences
